title: Chandrial
textPreview: Emperor of Arshalan between 4006 and 4010. A religious fundamentalist who attempted to conquer the Ustilian Empire. Died in the Siege of Feyn's Throne. Brother of Mussafir and uncle of Leysson. Founder of the Just Ones, who currently are trying to revive his legacy.

content.text: Emperor of Arshalan between 4006 and 4010. A religious fundamentalist who attempted to conquer the Ustilian Empire. Died in the Siege of Feyn's Throne. Brother of Mussafir and uncle of Leysson. Founder of the Just Ones, who currently are trying to revive his legacy.
Unite the world under the Mekhatimist faith
Purge all evil and become a living god
Sociopath who sees all his enemies as evil that must be eliminated

content.text: Nephew. Saw him as a potential successor.
Loyal friend who has helped him win many battles
